titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z254: Ketubah, 1909.

notesStmt.note: Printed border and arch in green and gold, with additional verses in gold. Includes depictions of hands in the form of the priestly blessing (with the text of the blessing printed inside the hands), a kiddush cup (topped with the Hebrew text: כוס של ז' ברכות), and decantor (topped with the Hebrew text: צלוחית של יין).

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
